item.description: 奇货可居诺伊曼谈为什么人工智能不会让你致富（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Neumann on Why AI Will Not Make You Rich (Podcast)】

item.title: 盛宝称亚洲是投资者寻求人工智能投资的理想之地
item.description: 盛宝市场（Saxo Markets）认为，由于美国科技公司的估值捉襟见肘，寻求投资热门人工智能主题的股票投资者应在亚洲寻找机会。【原文：Equity investors seeking exposure to the hot artificial intelligence theme should look for opportunities in Asia as US tech companies face stretched valuations, according to Saxo Markets.】

item.title: 沃达康与马斯克的 Starlink 公司合作发展非洲宽带
item.description: 南非最大的电话公司沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）合作，在非洲大陆的市场上增加宽带连接。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd., South Africa’s biggest phone company, has partnered with Elon Musk’s Starlink to increase broadband connectivity in its markets on the continent.】

item.title: 西门子计划削减 350 亿欧元核磁共振成像设备制造商股份
item.description: 在西门子公司 350 亿欧元（约合 405 亿美元）的持股拖累其股价之后，西门子公司正在最终确定减持其前医疗设备部门多数股份的方案。【原文：Siemens AG is finalizing options to reduce a majority stake in its former medical equipment unit after the €35 billion ($40.5 billion) holding turned into a drag on its share price.】

item.title: 美国向印度尼西亚归还受辐射污染的鞋类产品
item.description: 美国对印尼出口的鞋类产品进行了铯-137 污染标记，在已经包括虾和丁香的清单上又增加了一种显示辐射迹象的产品。【原文：The US has flagged Indonesian exports of footwear for cesium-137 contamination, adding another product showing signs of radiation to a list that already includes shrimp and cloves.】

item.title: 欧洲财报打破悲观预测，推动股市反弹
item.description: 欧洲第三季度盈利全面超出预期，支撑股市创下历史新高，并提振了人们对 2026 年前景的信心。【原文：European third-quarter earnings have exceeded expectations across the board, supporting stocks at record highs and boosting sentiment on the outlook for 2026.】

item.title: 据说创新光源将为香港最大的上市项目之一挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国光通信模块和设备制造商中际创新光通信有限公司（Zhongji Innolight Co.【原文：Zhongji Innolight Co., a Chinese maker of optical communication modules and devices, has picked banks for a Hong Kong listing that could raise $3 billion or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰勒温培警告英国预算猜测影响房屋销售
item.description: 英国最大的房屋建筑商之一泰勒温贝公司（Taylor Wimpey Plc）警告说，即将于11月公布的预算案中可能出现的税收变化的不确定性正在削弱住房市场。【原文：Taylor Wimpey Plc, one of Britain’s biggest housebuilders, warned that uncertainty about potential tax changes in the upcoming budget in November is weakening the housing market.】

item.title: 法国央行将上调国内生产总值预测以增强经济活力
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，由于法国经济继续表现出抵御政治动荡的韧性，法国央行可能会上调今明两年的经济增长预期。【原文：France’s central bank is likely to raise growth forecasts for this year and next as the economy continues to show resilience to political turmoil, Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: MUFG 与 OpenAI 合作，加速人工智能在银行服务中的应用
item.description: 日本最大的银行宣布与 OpenAI 合作，加快人工智能的应用，包括在下一财年新开设的数字贷款公司中的应用。【原文：Japan’s largest bank announced a tie up with OpenAI to accelerate its use of artificial intelligence, including in a new digital lender that’s set to open next fiscal year.】

item.title: 南非证交所称，市场飙升表明南非值得上调评级
item.description: 南非证券交易所负责人表示，南非的主权信用评级并没有反映出投资者情绪的改善，他建议 S&P Global Inc.【原文：South Africa’s sovereign credit rating doesn’t reflect improved investor sentiment, the head of the country’s stock exchange said, pitching for an upgrade from S&P Global Inc. as its markets and listings pipeline show signs of a recovery.】

item.title: 投资者对扭亏为盈的热情升温，Eskom 的借贷成本下降
item.description: 衡量 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.信用风险的一项指标已降至一年来的最低点，因为投资者加深了对这家南非国有电力公司在经历多年危机后已转危为安的押注。【原文：A measure of Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.’s credit risk has narrowed to the lowest in a year as investors deepen bets that South Africa’s state-owned power utility has turned a corner after years of crisis.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将维持在历史高位附近
英飞凌预计 2026 年收入增长，人工智能前景促进销售增长
item.description: 英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）预测，随着全球人工智能数据中心的蓬勃发展，其销售前景将在 2026 财年恢复增长。【原文：Infineon Technologies AG forecast revenue will return to growth in the 2026 fiscal year as the global boom in artificial intelligence data centers raised its sales outlook.】

item.title: 英伟达合作伙伴鸿海发布财报，人工智能助其实现稳健盈利
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit thanks to accelerated AI-related spending by major tech firms.】

item.title: 据说海信酝酿合并电子和家电部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，海信集团控股有限公司（Hisense Group Holdings Co.【原文：Hisense Group Holdings Co. is considering options for its consumer electronics and home appliances units, including a possible merger, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 为什么日元疲软会引发干预？
item.description: 日元再次走软考验着东京决策者的耐心，也令投资者感到不安。【原文：The Japanese yen’s renewed weakness is testing the patience of policymakers in Tokyo and unnerving investors.】

item.title: 谷歌与 Turkcell 合作建设超大规模数据中心
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）正与土耳其最大的移动运营商合作，在该国建设首个超大规模数据中心，为这家科技巨头提供了一个在快速增长的市场上扩大业务范围的机会。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is partnering with Turkey’s largest mobile operator to build the first hyperscale data center in the country, giving the tech giant an opportunity to expand its footprint in a fast-growing market.】

item.title: 需求旺盛，肯尼亚最大零售商计划增加 80% 门店
item.description: 肯尼亚顶级连锁超市奈瓦斯有限公司（Naivas Ltd.）的目标是通过每年开设多达 10 家分店，建立 200 家分店，以满足国内的强劲需求。【原文：Top Kenyan supermarket chain Naivas Ltd. is targeting 200 outlets by opening as many as 10 stores annually to meet strong demand in the nation.】

item.title: 谷歌被控使用双子座人工智能工具窥探用户隐私
item.description: 谷歌在一起诉讼中被指控利用其 Gemini 人工智能助手非法追踪其 Gmail、即时消息和视频会议程序用户的私人通信。【原文：Google was accused in a lawsuit of using its Gemini AI assistant to unlawfully track the private communications of users of its Gmail, instant messaging and videoconference programs.】

item.title: 日元逼近 155 日元，日本财务大臣再次发出外汇警告
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树（Satsuki Katayama）就汇率变动发出了新的警告，因为日元走软，逼近1美元兑换155日元的关键门槛，人们担心日元将逼近当局上次干预市场的水平。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama issued a fresh warning regarding currency movements as the yen weakened toward the key threshold of 155 to the dollar, amid concerns the currency will move closer toward levels where authorities last intervened in markets.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团将于 11 月在新加坡举办投资者活动
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼集团正计划于本月晚些时候在新加坡召开投资者会议，以增强全球投资者的信心，扩大集团的国际股东基础。【原文：Adani Group is planning an investor conference in Singapore later this month, people familiar with the matter said, as part of a push to bolster confidence among global investors and expand the group’s international shareholder base.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长瑞伊称政策动向包括方向取决于数据
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang Yong）表示，虽然韩国央行仍处于宽松周期，但未来任何利率变动的时间和规模，或政策方向，可能会根据即将公布的数据而发生变化。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong signaled that while the central bank remains in an easing cycle, the timing and size of any future rate moves — or the direction of policy — may shift depending on forthcoming data.】

item.title: 欧盟推迟碳排放规定，欧洲央行面临长期通胀下行风险
item.description: 欧盟新碳定价体系的推迟似乎将对通胀前景构成压力，从而有可能再次引发更多的降息呼声。【原文：A delay to the European Union’s new carbon-pricing system looks set to weigh on the outlook for inflation, potentially reviving calls for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 国际能源署在重要报告中重申看涨石油需求增长的观点
item.description: 国际能源机构进一步缓和了其关于石油需求即将达到顶峰的立场，重新提出了全球石油消费持续增长到本世纪中叶的设想。【原文：The International Energy Agency further tempered its stance on an imminent peak in oil demand, reinstating a scenario in which global consumption keeps growing to the middle of the century.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将以稳定的利率结束动荡的一年：决策指南
item.description: 在政治危机和市场动荡的一年中，罗马尼亚的决策者们准备在最后一次会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s policymakers are poised to keep interest rates unchanged at their last meeting of a year that was marked by a political crisis and market turbulence.】

item.title: 国际能源署称谁将掀起新一轮液化天然气浪潮仍是个问题
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，全球市场可以吸收创纪录的新一波液化天然气供应，但这在很大程度上取决于净零政策和可再生能源的增长。【原文：The global market could absorb a record wave of new supply of liquefied natural gas, but much depends on net zero policies and renewables growth, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 里夫斯准备预算案，英国企业寻求规避更多税收
item.description: 英国商界领袖敦促财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯在编制今年的预算时，降低能源成本，避免增加英国企业的税收负担。【原文：UK business chiefs urged Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves to ease energy costs and avoid raising the tax burden on corporate Britain as she prepares this year’s budget.】

item.title: 国家推动贷款增长，惠誉警告越南银行面临风险
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）警告说，越南银行的快速贷款步伐正在助长风险，当政府取消长期实行的信贷配额制度时，风险可能会增加。【原文：Vietnam’s banks rapid pace of lending is fueling risks, which could increase when the government removes a long-standing credit quota system, Fitch Ratings warned.】
